name: Once Again...
description:
DIRECTIONS: 

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim ranged attack

Right Click - Ranged spell attack

Left Click - Melee attack

DIVERSIFIERS: 

  • Spooky Season
  • Rhyme or Reason
  • Bold Choice
